snippet: The invitations to many of Donald J. Trump's fund-raisers may conspicuously lack host lists, but that's not the case for the events with Mr. Bush, like this one for Mr. Blunt. Some of the Republican Party's biggest donors are helping the former president raise money for embattled senators. The Times redacted fund-raising location information, as well as some contact information.
lead_paragraph: The invitations to many of Donald J. Trump's fund-raisers may conspicuously lack host lists, but that's not the case for the events with Mr. Bush, like this one for Mr. Blunt. Some of the Republican Party's biggest donors are helping the former president raise money for embattled senators. The Times redacted fund-raising location information, as well as some contact information.

headline.main: Invitation to Fund-Raiser for Roy Blunt Headlined by George W. Bush
